title: League won't launch game
body: Re installed twice, deleted everything including residual files both times, wiped the proper RADS files and repaired before that and also I restarted my PC both times I reinstalled. Game loads, shows me as in game but will not let me connect...also I'm not in a game. This is the third time this month I've had ridiculous problems with league....fuck...

replies.body: It sounds like your network is getting blocked, not so much your game files.  Are you on wifi?  Could be some instability or even a block by your firewall or antivirus.  Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) could help by auto-configuring your firewall settings, though, a[ power cycle](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic) wouldn't hurt.  Test it in a custom game and let me know if it helps!
